1569780.name: Betray Me Not
1569780.description:
Greetings, feline lover:

Enter this social deduction game for 4 to 10 players online or locally via wifi in which you must cooperate to complete all the mini-games to make your feline friend a happy cat. However, one or more random players from the cat colony will be chosen to have the power to turn the other cats into gold in order to amass a fortune in Cat-coins.

Why accumulate Cat-coins?
Simple.

There are cats who crave a change of look, and hair dye doesn't come for free. Plus, there are add-ons coming soon.

It is recommended to play this game between friends online or locally using voice chat.

If your profile is more of a lone cat, and you crave a bigger challenge, try the zombie mode. Round after round will follow as you deal with the threats that are after your kitty. Survive as long as you can and accumulate points to set your personal record.
